attributes.action: There should be a by-election for the 7 former Labour MP's whom have left.
attributes.additional_details: If a new party is formed it will give a greater mandate to the May who could recklessly destroy us with brexit.
attributes.background: Electors vote based on party not those standing for election. The democratic thing to do is to stick to our British Values and call for a by-election. These 7 MP's speak so confidently about what their constituents desire and demand, so a by-election would be a walk in the park for them.
